name: Mr. Penguin
description:
Hey ! Today let us (HydroGene & I) present you our new arcade game : Mr. Penguin !

In this little arcade game... Nah, we let you discover it, we hope you'll enjoy it, should be fun !

This game must be played only with right / left arrow, simple huh ?

So who done what :

- Musics & Programming -> HydroGene

- Graphics & Programming -> D3nX

- Gameplay (or Game design) -> D3nX & HydroGene

Oh I almost forgot, here is HydroGene itch.io : https://hydrogene.itch.io/
